General.Name: Supreme Engineering Limited
General.Description: Supreme Engineering Limited engages in the business of manufacturing of steel products and heavy engineering in India. The company's Special Steels division manufactures steel in ingots or other primary forms, and other semi-finished products of steel, as well as special alloys, such as super alloys, precipitation hardening, martensitic stainless, austenitic stainless, ultra high strength, and high speed steels. Its Wire division manufactures wire of steel by cold drawing or stretching; and hot-rolled and cold-rolled products of steel, and ferro-alloy, as well as wires, bright bars, fine wires, and profiles. The company serves the oil and gas, automotive, hand-tools, textile machinery, engineering industry, defense, space, atomic energy, and power. Supreme Engineering Limited was incorporated in 1987 and is based in Navi Mumbai, India.
General.Address: R-223, MIDC Complex, Navi Mumbai, India, 400701
